main event: Two reddish lights moved rapidly across the sky and disappeared at a point about 10 miles distant.
interesting points: One observer reported that one of the objects took a highly erratic course, while the other observer did not see it but noted it maintained a straight line of flight., The observation lasted for approximately 30 seconds., The sighting occurred at Edwards AFB, California., The objects were described as fixed, colored lights., The report concluded that one of the sightings could possibly be identified as aircraft.
sighted object: two reddish lights in the sky
witness description: Observers at the scene, including one who took note of the object's erratic movement.
